topics.body:
I read a actually interesting opinion piece and surprisingly it was by someone that is ultra conservative on social change.

It partially had to do with gamergate but the underlying message didn't so bear with me for a second.  For decades in the usa anti-geeks made moral panics about geek culture and that; "morality police" called DnD a satanic ritual, in the 90's there was Jack Thompson and such.  With gamergate what was found out is that the overwhelming majority of "video game journalists" never touched the game they reviewed; instead it turned out a lot of them were political activists who used their position to push their political agenda.  That is why they shit on letsplayers like markiplier and jontron cause markiplier and such are actually gamers whereas they aren't and just watch videos of people playing the games instead.


The reason why I bring this up is look at south korea; the usa actually has more gamers, nerds and geeks than south korea but south korea is so geeky that they have politicians cosplaying.

Why is south korea more geeky than the usa when we have more geeks?  Simple: cause of soccer moms, morality police and the such only exist in the usa.

1970's: mainstream usa culture, "geeks are worshippers of satan"
1980's: mainstream usa culture, "geeks are worshippers of satan"
1990's: mainstream usa culture, "geeks are worshippers of satan"
2000's: mainstream usa culture, "OH FUCK!  GEEKS ARE GOING MAINSTREAM EVEN THOUGH WE KEEP CALLING THEM SATAN WORSHIPPERS!"
2010-2015: mainstream usa culture, "TRY TO SHUT EVERYTHING DOWN!"


Right now a lot of 24/7 news won't accuse geeks of being satan worshippers anymore or such cause simply put geek culture is far too profitable; if they tried that old shit again they would have to pay millions of dollars from Disney or such for slandering Star Wars or Marvel or such.

Basically the soccer mom movement and the morality police movement when it comes to geek culture is finally dying.



Tl:dr; soccer moms before around 2005: "Geeks are satan worshippers" -> modern day: large scale companies like Disney now own Star Wars and Marvel -> if soccer moms try to slander Star Wars they would get sued -> the anti-geek movement is dying because if they go up against geeks now they'll get their ass sued off by multi-billion dollar companies.

Would we get into a war with extraterrestrial life due to coke?

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5552b16f6368722d55490100#post_5552b16f6368722d55490100
[bq="Gizoid101"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5552b0f66368722b1fff2600#post_5552b0f66368722b1fff2600
@USA is fucked up@
@Not surprised@[/bq]
Personally I was happy that Disney bought out Marvel and Star Wars.  Soccer moms will not fuck with Disney cause Disney does not fuck around when it comes to lawsuits.

Anti-geeks will not fuck with marvel or star wars cause they're owned by disney.
Anti-geeks will not fuck with trekkies cause star trek is owned by viacom.
Anti-geeks will not fuck with DC comics cause DC is owned by Time Warner.
Etc.


Simply put: anti-geeks can no longer fuck with geeks in the usa cause since the majority of geeky franchises are owned by major companies if anti-geeks try to start a metaphorical social war they would get sued into oblivion.
